solution_line_template: A team of {num_firefighters} firefighters with hoses can deliver {num_firefighters} * {gallons_per_hose_per_minute} = <<{num_firefighters}*{gallons_per_hose_per_minute}={team_delivery_rate_gpm}>>{team_delivery_rate_gpm} gallons of water per minute.

To deliver {total_gallons_needed} gallons, this team will take {total_gallons_needed}/{team_delivery_rate_gpm} = <<{total_gallons_needed}/{team_delivery_rate_gpm}={time_to_extinguish_minutes}>>{time_to_extinguish_minutes} minutes to extinguish the fire.
